example.text: The service members who signed up to defend their country and the people who supported them at Camp Lejeune were let down by their government in a big way. Over a 30-year period, thousands of Marines, their families, civilian workers and personnel used government provided tap water that was contaminated with harmful chemicals.

On the anniversary of the unprovoked invasion of Ukraine, I am proud to reaffirm my support for the Ukrainian people in their fight to defend their democracy. They have shown remarkable resilience and tenacity over the past 12 months against unwarranted Russian aggression, and I am proud to support continued aid and assistance to help Ukraine win this war.
